SERVICES.TITLE: My Services
SERVICES.SERVICE_1_DESCRIPTION: Full-stack development using .NET, C#, Angular, and Blazor for scalable, maintainable, cloud-native solutions.
SERVICES.SERVICE_2_DESCRIPTION: Clear and concise documentation using Confluence, covering codebases, systems architecture, and project guidelines.
SERVICES.SERVICE_3_DESCRIPTION: Design and optimization of relational databases, primarily with MSSQL, ensuring high performance and data integrity.
SERVICES.SERVICE_4_DESCRIPTION: Streamlining development workflows with Azure DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud infrastructure management.
SERVICES.SERVICE_5_DESCRIPTION: Providing strategic insights on software architecture, cloud migration, and best practices for robust, maintainable systems.
SERVICES.SERVICE_6_DESCRIPTION: Training teams on modern development practices, including Agile methodologies, cloud technologies, and .NET
